Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody, nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The Bill Clinton did not lie. The vice Bill Clinton did not lie. Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, D.C., about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and an implant would cross the line. He also said that as users voluntarily share information online, it doesn't need users to type in search queries for the company to tailor the results. "
